beer.name: Light
beer.description: Shipyard Light Beer is a true light ale with a soft golden color and good, clean taste. Using the finest 2-row English Pale Ale malt, malted wheat, and a special combination of Hallertau and Mount Hood hops, Shipyard has created a smooth, easy drinking light beer.
